thread.subject: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body:
Dear Sunset Vista Hotel team,

We're excited to offer you a special Diwali discount on our partner program!  This is a fantastic opportunity to boost your bookings during the peak Diwali season. Please see the attached brochure for details. We'd love to discuss how we can tailor this offer to best suit your needs.

Sincerely,
Your Email Reply Team

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body: Thanks for reaching out!  We'll review this and get back to you.

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body:
Hi team,
Just checking in to see if you had a chance to review the Diwali offer.  Let us know if you have any questions.

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body: Following up again on our Diwali Discount Offer. We understand you're busy, but we'd really appreciate the opportunity to discuss how this could benefit Sunset Vista Hotel.

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body: Apologies for the delay.  We're interested in learning more.  Please schedule a brief call next week.
